attributes.action: improve mobility for people with a fear of confinement./ lack of control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please make it law that all trains in the u.k. have at lease one openable window or door on every train cariage that passengers can control without breaking glass. approx 5% of us suffer from some sort of fear of confinement,or lack of control (3 million people.) and avoid, or never use the train.This form of dissability is never recognised. or spoken about, but its very real. please help us become more mobile. it would cost little, but would make a big difference to many thousands of people. and be good for the environment.
